Ingredients.1: 1 (11 ounce) container refrigerated soft breadsticks, separated

Ingredients.6: 3 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).

Directions.2: Tie each breadstick in a knot; do not pull the ends through, just barely tie them up so they are sort of in a ball shape. Place on an ungreased baking sheet.

Directions.3: Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, 11 to 13 minutes.

Directions.4: Meanwhile, combine butter, garlic, and olive oil in a small pan over medium-low heat. Cook until butter has melted, then stir to combine flavors.

Directions.5: Remove knots from the oven and transfer to a medium or large bowl. Pour garlic mixture over top and toss to combine.

Directions.6: Plate the knots and pour any remaining liquid and garlic over top. Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese and salt.
